title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Crichtonproposed to Livingston to join him in this meditatedtreachery, and, though enemies to each other, theGuardian of the King and the Chancellor ofthe kingdom united in the vile project of cutting off two boys.
